messages.subject: Fw: [tri-county-chat] Fw: Goddard Program for Homeschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: From: Pat Farenga To: Goddard email list 3 Sent: Tuesday, September 07, 2004 2:40 PM Subject: Goddard Program for Homeschoolers Dear Friend, I sent you an
messages.messageBody:
From: Pat Farenga
To: Goddard email list 3
Sent: Tuesday, September 07, 2004 2:40 PM
Subject: Goddard Program for Homeschoolers


Dear Friend,

I sent you an earlier email alerting you to the upcoming "Goddard College
Celebrates Homeschooling" event on Oct. 1 - 3.

Now I want to share with you the complete program for this exciting weekend.
It is attached as a pdf file. Can you please share it with people who you
think would be interested in it?

If you have any questions about the event, contact me or visit the Goddard
website:

www.goddard.edu/events/goddardevents.html

Thank you,
Pat Farenga
Co-author TEACH YOUR OWN: THE JOHN HOLT BOOK OF HOMESCHOOLING (Perseus,
2003)
Voice: 781 - 395-8508 Fax: 781-874-1053
www.holtgws.com



Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
